thread.section_title: www.marlows-diamonds.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.marlows-diamonds.co.uk
thread.title: Navroop Sekhon

author: Navroop Sekhon
title: Navroop Sekhon
text:
After walking around in the Jewellery Quarter for hours, not being able to find the perfect engagement ring, we walked into Marlows. The staff were very friendly and helpful and this was the only shop where both me and my partner loved the ring!
He then went back a few months later and bought a matching wedding ring. I have no complaints so far and LOVE my engagement and wedding rings :)
